text: Margarita Carmen Cansino, usually called Rita Hayworth (October 17, 1918â€“May 14, 1987), was an American actress of Spanish and Irish origin. She became famous as the greatest sex symbol of the 1940s. She died of Alzheimer's at age 68 in Manhattan, New York. title: Rita Hayworth
